public ref class CorrelationParameterAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Indicates the name of the parameter used for correlation in the methods and events defined on an ExternalDataExchange interface. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Default setting; can be overridden by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CorrelationAliasAttribute>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use a CorrelationParameterAttribute for an EnternalDataExchange interface. This code example is from the CorrelatedLocalService SDK sample. For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
